meanings.definition: A motor protein that moves along microtubules in cells
meanings.sent1: The dynein carried important materials within the cell.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied how dynein helps transport nutrients in cells.
meanings.sent3: The dynein protein decided to take a leisurely stroll along the microtubules.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny worker, dynein tirelessly shuttles cargo within the cell.
meanings.sent5: The image of dynein chugging along the microtubules stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: A complex of proteins involved in cellular transport
meanings.sent1: Within the cell, the dynein complex worked together to move materials.
meanings.sent2: Researchers discovered new functions of the dynein protein complex.
meanings.sent3: The dynein proteins threw a party to celebrate their successful transport mission.
meanings.sent4: The dynein complex acted like a well-coordinated team, ensuring smooth transport.
meanings.sent5: The intricate dance of the dynein proteins mesmerized the scientists.

meanings.definition: A molecular motor that converts chemical energy into mechanical work
meanings.sent1: The dynein motor efficiently converted energy to move along the microtubules.
meanings.sent2: Cells rely on dynein as a molecular motor for various functions.
meanings.sent3: The dynein motor challenged the other motors to a race.
meanings.sent4: Dynein, the powerhouse of the cell, tirelessly powered cellular movement.
meanings.sent5: The relentless dynein motor hummed as it converted energy into motion.
